channel.title: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!
channel.description: Basically i want to create my own server but i know nothing at all about private servers so i was wondering if someone could help me out, tell me what i need to download and what things i can check out to help me. I have downloaded JDK and Winrar, do i need anything else to download? Also does anyone know any good 317 client/source i can start from?

item.title: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You need to portforward on your router
start button
cmd
ipconfig
find default gateway type that number in browser
it will ask you to login
username should to admin
passwords to try: admin, administrator, password, or whatever you or your parents set it to
sign-up for no-ip
make a (Add) Host for example such as devolutionx3scape.no-ip.biz
download no-ip
find a source/client
make 2 copy’s of client one for you to login other for public

Read full topic
item.source: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!

item.title: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Might wanna check out the server downloads section for my mini-tutorials. Also, use what Team_Rocket said.

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:6, topic:427520”][quote author=Deci link=topic=530218.msg3871056#msg3871056 date=1325347222]
Oh right, after i have knowledge about Java what should i do next & do i have to download anything else?
[/quote]

Ummm… Download a Source and Client. I recommend a Devolution Source and a blank 317 Client. Other than that just follow the tutorial and you’ll be fine.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!

item.title: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Deci:

[Quote]Devolution would be a good starting base, and never use PI.

Where would i find Devolution and why shouldn’t i use PI?[/quote]

Use the Search feature or Google. PI stands for Project Insanity, it should stand for “Project I’m Batshit Insane”. It has a TON of problems, and the features are poorly programmed. Alot of new people use it when they shouldn’t be learning from it.

Read full topic
item.source: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!

item.title: New To Private Servers - Advice/Help Needed!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

If you don’t have any experience in Java, I suggest you read some Java Documents. Devolution would be a good starting base, and never use PI.

Read full topic
